name: Corn Chowder
preparation: Melt butter in Multipurpose Pot over medium heat.
Add onion, red pepper and Chipotle. Cook for 5 minutes, or until onions are softened.
Sprinkle in flour and stir for 1–2 minutes.
Slowly add Bouillon and milk. Simmer, whisking until smooth.
Stir in corn and Dip Mix (or chives). Season with Sea Salt, if you like, and serve hot.

products.name: Chipotle Aioli Mix
summary: Medium-spicy Southwestern flavor with noteworthy chipotle chili and smoked paprika. A crowd-pleasing condiment for your burgers, fries, fish tacos, burritos and anything else that needs a little extra kick.

products.name: Nourish Broth Mix
summary: Rich taste of slowly simmered chicken with garden-fresh flavours of onion, celery, and herbs. Just add water!

products.name: Vegetable Broth Mix
summary: Make a tasty vegetable broth in a matter of seconds! Same garden-fresh flavor as making it from scratch—just add water!

products.name: Herb & Garlic Dip Mix
summary: Classic notes of chives, parsley, & garlic.
